summary: THIS IS THE FOURTH MAXX FORCE DT ENGINE EQUIPPED DIESEL PARTICULATE FILTER (DPF), EPA '07 AND EPA '10, WHICH HAS FAILED INTERNALLY WITHIN OUR FLEET OF 11 DIFFERENT VEHICLE AT VARYING MILEAGES AND AGES. THE REMAINING THREE FAILURES ALL OCCURRED WITH INTERNATIONAL IC RE SCHOOL BUSES. THE DPF FAILURES CAUSE THE ENGINE TO DE-RATE WHICH REDUCES THE POWER.  *TR
